mapper.select: SELECT EVENT.CONTENT_ID, title,addr1,CAT3,TO_CHAR(EVENT_STARTDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') as dbstart,TO_CHAR(EVENT_ENDDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') as dbend,FIRST_IMAGE,rownum,review_count from EVENT,CONTENT where event.CONTENT_ID=content.CONTENT_ID and EVENT_ENDDATE >= sysdate and CAT2='A0208' and rownum <6
SELECT EVENT.CONTENT_ID,title,FIRST_IMAGE,AREACODE from EVENT, CONTENT where event.CONTENT_ID=content.CONTENT_ID and cat2='A0207' and EVENT_ENDDATE>=sysdate and EVENT_STARTDATE<=sysdate and rownum<5

select TITLE,OFFSEASON_MINFEE1,CAT3,FIRST_IMAGE,CONTENT_ID,REVIEW_COUNT,REVIEW_TOTAL from (SELECT h.TITLE,h.OFFSEASON_MINFEE1,h.CAT3,h.FIRST_IMAGE,h.CONTENT_ID,REVIEW_COUNT,REVIEW_TOTAL FROM hotel_list_view h join content c on h.CONTENT_ID=c.CONTENT_ID where c.areacode=#{areacode} and OFFSEASON_MINFEE1!=0 order by OFFSEASON_MINFEE1) where rownum<6
SELECT e.CONTENT_ID, INFO_ID, INFONAME, INFOTEXT FROM EVENT e join EVENT_DETAIL d ON e.CONTENT_ID=d.CONTENT_ID WHERE e.CONTENT_ID=#{contid}
SELECT e.content_id, IMG_ID, ORIGIN_IMG, THUMB_IMG FROM EVENT e join DETAIL_IMAGE d ON e.CONTENT_ID=d.CONTENT_ID WHERE e.CONTENT_ID=#{contid}
select pwd from USER_INFO WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.update: update USER_INFO set name=#{name}, pwd=#{pwd}, NICKNAME=#{nickname}, BIRTHDAY=#{birthday}, EMAIL=#{email}, post=#{post}, ADDR1=#{addr1}, ADDR2=#{addr2}, PHONE=#{phone} WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into cart (cno, account, price, total_price, content_id, user_id) values (cart_cno_seq.nextval, #{account}, #{price}, #{total_price}, #{content_id}, #{user_id})
mapper.update: update cart set account=#{account}, total_price=#{total_price} where cno=#{cno}
mapper.select: select eventcart_count from user_info where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into EVENT_ORDER (PAYMENT_ID,order_id, account, total_price, content_id, user_id) values (eo_pid_seq.nextval,#{order_id},#{account},#{total_price},#{content_id},#{user_id})
mapper.select: select PAYMENT_ID, order_id, account, total_price, used, c.content_id, order_date, title, to_char(EVENT_STARTDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') as dbstart, to_char(EVENT_ENDDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') as dbend, first_image from EVENT_ORDER o join CONTENT c on o.CONTENT_ID=c.CONTENT_ID join event e on o.CONTENT_ID=e.CONTENT_ID where PAYMENT_ID =#{PAYMENT_ID} and c.CONTENT_ID=#{content_id}

select no, content_id, type, user_id, message, rate, dbday, nickname, num from (select t.*, rownum as num from (select r.no,r.content_id,r.type,r.user_id as user_id,r.MESSAGE,r.rate,to_char(regdate,'YYYY.MM.DD') as dbday,u.NICKNAME from review r join USER_INFO u on r.USER_ID = U.USER_ID where content_id=#{content_id} order by REGDATE desc) t) where num between #{start} and #{end}
SELECT count(*) from review where CONTENT_ID=#{content_id}
mapper.update: update EVENT_ORDER set used=#{used} where payment_id=#{payment_id}
mapper.select: select PAYMENT_ID, order_id, account, total_price, used, c.content_id, to_char(ORDER_DATE,'""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"') as dbday, title from EVENT_ORDER o join CONTENT c on o.CONTENT_ID=c.CONTENT_ID join event e on o.CONTENT_ID=e.CONTENT_ID where USER_ID=#{user_id} and c.CONTENT_ID=#{content_id} and USED='y'
